articles.title: Cboe chief resigns over undisclosed relationships with colleagues - Financial Times
articles.description: Edward Tilly to be replaced as boss of Chicago exchange group by board member Fredric Tomczyk
articles.content:
The chief executive of Cboe Global Markets has resigned after the exchange operator said he failed to disclose personal relationships with colleagues.

articles.title: UK antitrust regulator lays out seven AI principles - The Verge
articles.description: The UK’s Competition and Markets Authority laid out seven guiding principles to ensure the development of AI models remains safe and fosters competitiveness.
